# Tutorial Notes:  

The Beauty of R Studio is the ability to have notebooks for data analysis.  It allows us to run r-code inline.  Think of it as a fancy chemistry notebook for data analysis.  For this notebook, I will use the titanic data for analysis.  This assumes that you have R and RStudio loaded.  


```{r}
# We probably want to load the titanic data
# {r} synthax above indicates that this block can run inline r-code

#To see if the inline works, let's add to numbers and see which output is generated after we click on the upper-right play button:


2+2
```
